page.title: 10LEDURE AND RECREATION
page.content: ON RAASAY THERE ARE A LOT OF THINGS TO DO.PEOPLE WHO COME OVER ON THE FERRY CAN DO ALL SORTS OF THINGS LIKE WALKING ON THE ISLAND,GOING OUT IN A BOAT AND DOING SOME FISHING AND CLIMBING UP HILLS. THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF PEOPLE WHO CLIMB UP DUN,CAN.MOST PEOPLE CLIMB UP DUN,CAN BECAUSE IT IS THE HIGHEST PEEK ON RAASAY.IF YOU DONT WANT TO WALK YOU CAN TAKE YOUR CAR. YOU CAN ALSO GO BIRD WATCHING.RAASAY HAS A LOT OF BIRDS THAT OTHER PLACES DONT LIKE EAGLES.YOU CAN GO FISHING IN LOCHS FOR TROUT AND OUT AT SEA FOR MACKERAL AND SAITHE OR OTHER SEA FISH. YOU CAN GET FOSILS ON RAASAY TO.FOSILS ARE OF GREAT INTEREST TO GEOLIGISTS BECAUSE THEY ARE SO OLD.THE ISLAND IS SO SMALL THAT YOU CAN CYCLE ROUND IT OR CAMP AND ENJOY A NICE PEACEFULL HOLIDAY.
